title: 7.3 Custom bots.
body: Why are they currently disabled? it isn't mentioned in the patch notes and I can't find any information on it?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Off the top of my head without doing too much digging, I'm fairly sure the ability to add bots to custom games is not yet implemented in the new client, switching back to the old client will allow you to accomplish this.
I have used bots in aram on the new client a bunch now, looks like a recent change. Maybe a couple of weeks ago (ish) it was removed.
